languages.text: {n}Спрятав глаза, Джай печально кивает.{/n} "Так будет лучше, шерин".
{n}Covering her hands, Jae nods sadly.{/n} "It's better this way, shereen."
languages.original_text: {n}Спрятав глаза, Джай печально кивает.{/n} "Так будет лучше, шерин".

languages.text: {n}婕伊双手合十，悲伤地点着头。{/n}“这样对我们都好，亲爱的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Covering her hands, Jae nods sadly.{/n} "It's better this way, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊双手合十，悲伤地点着头。{/n}“这样对我们都好，亲爱的。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}自身の手を覆いながら、ジェイは悲しげに頷く。{/n}「この方が良いんだ、シャリーン」
languages.original_text: {n}Covering her hands, Jae nods sadly.{/n} "It's better this way, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}自身の手を覆いながら、ジェイは悲しげに頷く。{/n}「この方が良いんだ、シャリーン」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae se cubre las manos y asiente con tristeza.{/n} «Es mejor así, shereen».
languages.original_text: {n}Covering her hands, Jae nods sadly.{/n} "It's better this way, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se cubre las manos y asiente con tristeza.{/n} «Es mejor así, shereen».

languages.text: {n}Jae se couvre les mains et hoche tristement la tête.{/n} « C'est mieux ainsi, shereen. »
languages.original_text: {n}Covering her hands, Jae nods sadly.{/n} "It's better this way, shereen."

languages.text: {n}Jae bedeckt ihre Hände und nickt traurig.{/n} "Es ist besser so, Shereen."
languages.original_text: {n}Covering her hands, Jae nods sadly.{/n} "It's better this way, shereen."

languages.text: {n}Jae, ellerini tutup hüzünlü bir edayla onaylar anlamda başını sallıyor.{/n} "Böylesi en iyisi şirinim."
languages.original_text: {n}Covering her hands, Jae nods sadly.{/n} "It's better this way, shereen."
